original_text: Then the Lamb opened the third seal. I heard the next being say, ‘Come!’ I looked, and I saw a black horse. The person who was riding the horse held something in his hand. He used it to weigh things.
korean_text: 셋째 인을 떼실 때에 내가 들으니 셋째 생물이 말하되 오라 하기로 내가 보니 검은 말이 나오는데 그 탄 자가 손에 저울을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lamb opened the third seal
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 어린 양이 세 번째 인을 떼었습니다

sentences.original_text: I heard the next being say
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 다음 생물이 말하는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: I looked, and I saw a black horse
The person who was riding the horse
He used it to weigh things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것으로 물건을 무게를 재는 데 사용했습니다
